item.title: Testing and Coverage: A Practical Approach
item.description:
The Importance of Tests and Coverage

Testing is a critical part of software development that ensures your code works as expected and continues to work as you make changes. Code coverage metrics help you understand which parts of your codebase are being tested and which aren’t.

Good test coverage doesn’t just mean hitting a percentage target—it means testing the right behaviors and edge cases. A high coverage percentage can give you confidence, but it’s the quality of your tests that truly matters.

item.title: Experimenting with Tidewave: Vibe Coding
item.description:
What is Tidewave?

Tidewave is an AI coding assisstant meant for full stack web development. It is built on top of Elixir and Phoenix by José Valim. What I found different about Tidewave is that it runs insdie of your browser. It is deeply integrated with your web frameworkand easily allows you to see what the coding agent is doing in real time.
